    <item> 
      <title>England call up uncapped Vince and Ball</title>  
      <description>Uncapped duo James Vince and Jake Ball are named in England's 12-man squad for the first Test against Sri Lanka at Headingley.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36272668</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36272668</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:53:45 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>England must build on Edwards - Connor</title>  
      <description>A greater focus on the English grassroots game is needed to build on Charlotte Edwards' legacy, says the head of England women's cricket.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36281363</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36281363</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:17:23 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Ball's England call-up a 'slow-burner'</title>  
      <description>Jake Ball's international call-up is a "slow burner" and a reward for dedication, says Notts director of cricket Mick Newell.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36274249</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36274249</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:54:37 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="37" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/259B/production/_89672690_ballhead_getty.jpg"/>  
      <media:thumbnail width="144" height="81" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/4CAB/production/_89672691_ballhead_getty.jpg"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>ICC appoints first independent chairman</title>  
      <description>The International Cricket Council (ICC) appoints India's Shashank Manohar as its first independent chairman.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36273972</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36273972</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 07:02:58 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="37" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/1D48/production/_89669470_manhoar3_getty.jpg"/>  
      <media:thumbnail width="144" height="81" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/4458/production/_89669471_manhoar3_getty.jpg"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Ansari out for 'immediate future'</title>  
      <description>Surrey all-rounder Zafar Ansari is facing a spell on the sidelines after suffering soft tissue damage to his left thumb.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36276388</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36276388</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:10:55 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="49" url="http://news.bbcimg.co.uk/media/images/51162000/gif/_51162006_surrey_66x49.gif"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Legendary commentator Cozier dies aged 75</title>  
      <description>West Indian commentator Tony Cozier, "one of the finest writers and broadcasters in cricket", dies after a career spanning 58 years.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36254041</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36254041</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 18:51:38 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Champions Yorkshire beat Surrey to go top</title>  
      <description>Defending county champions Yorkshire beat Surrey by an innings and 20 runs at Headingley, their first win of the season.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36261743</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36261743</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 17:24:46 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Perera drugs ban lifted by ICC</title>  
      <description>Sri Lanka's Kusal Perera is free to return to action after his provisional suspension for failing a drugs test is lifted.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36272101</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36272101</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 19:58:33 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="37" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/114DC/production/_89667807_perara1_getty.jpg"/>  
      <media:thumbnail width="144" height="81" url="http://c.files.bbci.co.uk/13BEC/production/_89667808_perara1_getty.jpg"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Lancashire seal innings win over Hampshire</title>  
      <description>Simon Kerrigan takes 5-59 as Lancashire beat Hampshire by an innings and 94 runs in Championship Division One.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36262510</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36262510</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 15:04:29 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Howzat! Ex-keeper Goram takes 2-24</title>  
      <description>Ex-Scotland keeper Andy Goram shows he is also still useful with the cricket ball by taking 2-24 against Lancashire over-50s.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36275012</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36275012</guid>  
      <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 09:26:01 GMT</pubDate> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Willey ordered to take bowling break</title>  
      <description>Yorkshire and England all-rounder David Willey is told to stop bowling for six weeks because of an abdominal injury.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36266188</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36266188</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 09:43:05 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="49" url="http://news.bbcimg.co.uk/media/images/42845000/gif/_42845623_yorkshire_66x49.gif"/> 
    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Glamorgan interested in SA bowler Steyn</title>  
      <description>Glamorgan hope to sign South Africa fast bowler Dale Steyn for part of their T20 Blast campaign, confirms captain Jacques Rudolph.</description>  
      <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36259808</link>  
      <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/cricket/36259808</guid>  
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 11:38:00 GMT</pubDate>  
      <media:thumbnail width="66" height="49" url="http://news.bbcimg.co.uk/media/images/45670000/gif/_45670675_glamorgan_66x49.gif"/> 
    </item>
